name: Catch a note - Free
description:
Platform game that gets the heart pumping faster. Help Poor Edvard find his notes. Jump your way through a maze in the cold winter landscape. While directing a symphony. It's not easy being a composer today. Find the notes before the symphony ends.

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

Note: the game is very difficult to win.

The map is a maze with different rooms. If you move towards the edge of a room you will come to the next room. When you get to the last room and touches the edge you will come to the first. Jump into a pit you will come to the room below. Jump down more you will come to the first room. Look around you and try to determine how you should proceed to solve the maze.

How to play?
Press the left side of the screen to move left and vice versa.
Press the left or right screen again to jump.
